mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.liliaoxiangmu_id as liliaoxiangmuId ,a.yonghu_id as yonghuId ,a.xiangmushenqing_yesno_types as xiangmushenqingYesnoTypes ,a.xiangmushenqing_yesno_text as xiangmushenqingYesnoText ,a.update_time as updateTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段 ,liliaoxiangmu.liliaoxiangmu_name as liliaoxiangmuName ,liliaoxiangmu.liliaoxiangmu_types as liliaoxiangmuTypes ,liliaoxiangmu.liliaoxiangmu_content as liliaoxiangmuContent ,yonghu.yonghu_name as yonghuName ,yonghu.yonghu_photo as yonghuPhoto ,yonghu.yonghu_phone as yonghuPhone ,yonghu.yonghu_email as yonghuEmail ,yonghu.yisheng_id as yonghuYishengId ,yonghu.yonghu_delete as yonghuDelete
FROM xiangmushenqing a left JOIN liliaoxiangmu liliaoxiangmu ON a.liliaoxiangmu_id = liliaoxiangmu.id left JOIN yonghu yonghu ON a.yonghu_id = yonghu.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and ( a.liliaoxiangmu_id = #{params.liliaoxiangmuId} )
and ( a.yonghu_id = #{params.yonghuId} )
and a.xiangmushenqing_yesno_types = #{params.xiangmushenqingYesnoTypes}
and a.xiangmushenqing_yesno_text like CONCAT('%',#{params.xiangmushenqingYesnoText},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.update_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.updateTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.update_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.updateTimeEnd})
and a.liliaoxiangmu_id IS NOT NULL
and liliaoxiangmu.liliaoxiangmu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.liliaoxiangmuName},'%')
and liliaoxiangmu.liliaoxiangmu_types = #{params.liliaoxiangmuTypes}
and liliaoxiangmu.liliaoxiangmu_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.liliaoxiangmuContent},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(liliaoxiangmu.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(liliaoxiangmu.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.yonghu_id IS NOT NULL
and yonghu.yonghu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuName},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuPhone},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuEmail},'%')
and yonghu.yisheng_id = #{params.yishengId}
and yonghu.yonghu_delete >= #{params.yonghuDeleteStart}
and yonghu.yonghu_delete <= #{params.yonghuDeleteEnd}
and yonghu.yonghu_delete = #{params.yonghuDelete}
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(yonghu.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(yonghu.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
